DESC_TEXT:
Hey **{{username}}**, my name is **Betty**!

A powerful Slash Commands only Discord Music bot with functions like custom playlists, 24/7 mode or Song Request Channel and much more.

Nobody can see my slash commands? [Re-invite]({{InviteURL}}) me and verify @everyone has the **Use Application Commands** permissions!

Need Support? [discord.gg/ZVERh35]({{SupportURL}})
